snippet: Annie Cohen-Solal sees Mark Rothko as a man with the messianic goal of mending the world and deeply hostile to the commercial side of art. One of his paintings is leading Christie’s May auctions.
abstract: Annie Cohen-Solal sees Mark Rothko as a man with the messianic goal of mending the world and deeply hostile to the commercial side of art. One of his paintings is leading Christie’s May auctions.

headline.main: With a Big Sale Looming, a New View of Rothko
